sentences.en: a huge mass of data
sentences.cn: 大量资料

sentences.en: a mass protest
sentences.cn: 大规模的抗议

sentences.en: All the lights went off, and mass hysteria broke out.
sentences.cn: 所有的灯都熄灭了，大家都变得歇斯底里起来。

sentences.en: At High Mass the priest preached a sermon on the devil.
sentences.cn: 牧师在大弥撒上布道驱邪。

sentences.en: At the horizon the land mass becomes a continuous pale neutral grey.
sentences.cn: 陆地在地平线处变成了一片浅灰。

sentences.en: From this you can calculate the total mass in the Galaxy.
sentences.cn: 由此你可以算出银河系的总质量。

sentences.en: government attempts to suppress dissatisfaction among the masses
sentences.cn: 政府试图压制群众不满情绪的做法

sentences.en: her genuine affection for humanity in the mass.
sentences.cn: 她对整个人类的真情。

sentences.en: His Eminence Cardinal Hume celebrated Mass.
sentences.cn: 休谟红衣主教大人主持了弥撒。

sentences.en: I began sifting through the mass of evidence.
sentences.cn: 我开始认真筛选大量的证据。

sentences.en: In the mass production era multinational firms tended to centralize their operations.
sentences.cn: 在大规模生产的时代，跨国公司往往实行集权化经营。

sentences.en: In the spring, the meadow is a mass of daffodils.
sentences.cn: 春天，草地上开满了黄水仙。

sentences.en: Madrigueras station was a seething mass of soldiers.
sentences.cn: 马德里古埃拉斯车站到处都是士兵。

sentences.en: On his desk is a mass of books and papers.
sentences.cn: 他的书桌上有大堆的书籍和文件。

sentences.en: Only in this way can the critical mass of participation be reached.
sentences.cn: 只有这样才能凑足参与人数。

sentences.en: Only with mass direct action will we obtain such change.
sentences.cn: 只有采取大规模直接行动，我们才会取得这样的改变。

sentences.en: Procter & Gamble is the leader in the mass market cosmetics industry.
sentences.cn: 宝洁是大众化妆品行业中的领头羊。

sentences.en: She attended a convent school and went to Mass each day.
sentences.cn: 她上的是教会学校，每天都去做弥撒。

sentences.en: Shortly after the workers went on strike, police began to mass at the shipyard.
sentences.cn: 工人罢工后不久，警察开始在造船厂集结。

sentences.en: Slowly she threaded her way back through the moving mass of bodies.
sentences.cn: 她从人流中慢慢地挤了回来。

sentences.en: The food had congealed into a sticky mass.
sentences.cn: 那食物结成了黏糊糊的一团。

sentences.en: The fourteenth century cathedral was reduced to a mass of rubble.
sentences.cn: 这座14世纪的大教堂变成了一堆瓦砾。

sentences.en: the problem of mass unemployment
sentences.cn: 大批人失业的问题

sentences.en: The road was blocked by a solid mass of protesters.
sentences.cn: 道路被密密麻麻的抗议者阻塞了。

sentences.en: The Sun makes up 99.9% of the mass of our solar system.
sentences.cn: 太阳占太阳系质量的99.9%。

sentences.en: The war is strongly supported by the mass of the population.
sentences.cn: 这场战争得到了大多数人的有力支持。

sentences.en: weapons of mass destruction
sentences.cn: 大规模杀伤性武器

words.tran_cn: 大量的；巨大的，厚重的；魁伟的
群众的，民众的；大规模的，集中的

phrases.tran_cn: 身体质量指数；体质指数；体质指数
大块混凝土；无钢筋混凝土
大规模定制；大众化定制
质量传递，传质；质量转移
公共交通；集体运输，大众运输
岩体；岩块，岩块体；岩石层

trans.tran_en: involving or intended for a very large number of people

trans.tran_cn: 一团，大堆，大量，块，民众，大部分，充满，质量，弥撒，弥撒曲
trans.tran_en: the amount of material in something
to come together, or to make people or things come together, in a large group
